issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.nytimes.com/2025/07/17/arts/television/untamed-review-netflix.html](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F2025%2F07%2F17%2Farts%2Ftelevision%2Funtamed-review-netflix.html) ### Comment > AdGuard isn't filtering ads on NYT.com ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fn2kmf4untc84wcgwgk4sow4co000swk908gxypicg.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.21.0 RC (5073) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests

**Browser API**:
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection,
AdGuard URL Tracking

Other:
AdGuard Experimental

Language-specific:
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese,
Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard,
Polish Anti Adblock Filters Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Assistant (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/assistant/4.3/assistant.user.js)`
`AdGuard Extra (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)`
`AdGuard Popup Blocker (Beta) (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://www.nytimes.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F) Other extensions used: | `Only extensions are AdGuard Browser Assistant Beta & Google Docs Offline with Avast Premium Security Antivirus. ` ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&clid=ddE3ID--NKLjVg--jydOj3&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1.15&dns.servers=System&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Assistant%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fassistant%2F4.3%2Fassistant.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28Beta%29%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Fbeta%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.5.6.7.17.216.238&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.21.0+RC+%285073%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nytimes.com%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=true&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=true&stealth.disable_windows_defender=true&stealth.disable_windows_recall=true&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.location=true&stealth.push=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%29+AppleWebKit%2F537.36+%28KHTML%2C+like+Gecko%29+Chrome%2F138.0.0.0+Safari%2F537.36&utm_campaign=report&utm_medium=assistant&utm_source=win&win.wfp=true)
